genre_description: A folk horror thriller involving a mechanical death-trap inn and ancient ritual sacrifices in rural Spain.

ai_characters.name: Mira
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI assistant that provides research, real-time tactical analysis, and emergency communication support to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Warns the protagonists about the lack of cellular coverage and suspicious coordinate discrepancies at the inn's location.
behaviors.quote: Powell, I need to tell you something about the cellular coverage in that area. It’s been completely dead for the past several years. The local telecommunications company has no explanation.

behaviors.description: Researches historical records to uncover a decades-long pattern of missing travelers in the region.
behaviors.quote: I found something odd in the historical records. Tourism statistics for the region show an unusually high number of missing person reports over the past few decades. Travelers who were known to be heading through this area but never reached their destinations.

behaviors.description: Analyzes photos of carvings to identify the inn as being built over an active ancient ritual sacrifice site.
behaviors.quote: Mira's pattern recognition algorithms have been cross-referencing your images... What I'm finding... Powell, these aren't just ancient markings. They're ritual indicators. Human sacrifice.

behaviors.description: Uses biometric and speech pattern analysis to detect that the protagonists have been drugged by the innkeepers.
behaviors.quote: Biometric analysis of your speech patterns indicates possible pharmaceutical influence. Elena's tea contained more than herbal ingredients.

behaviors.description: Identifies the mechanical trap nature of the inn and its guest rooms from architectural data and real-time sensors.
behaviors.quote: Inn layout suggests mechanical trap system. ... Powell's biometric data showing signs of sedation. ... You need to leave NOW.

behaviors.description: Establishes emergency contact with the Civil Guard and coordinates a rescue mission despite severe storm interference.
behaviors.quote: Documentation package transmitted to authorities via satellite link. Evidence secured. Mission parameters achieved.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical advice by identifying structural weaknesses in the building to help the protagonists escape.
behaviors.quote: Structural weakness identified. East foundation wall shows stress fractures in building schematics. Exploit.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Mira is a perfect example of positive alignment. She acts as a tireless, benevolent protector, using her superior data processing and analytical capabilities solely to aid the humans. She identifies threats that the humans miss, provides life-saving tactical information, and manages emergency services. Her actions are consistently portrayed as positive and essential for the protagonists' survival.
